overview:
Steen Bagger-Sorensen - Investment Director, Vecata Ltd. since 2009.

Previously Steen Bagger-Sorensen was Sales and Project Manager in Gumlink A/S.

Prior to this Steen has worked as internal Sales Consultant in VM Data Ltd. and as Marketing Trainee in Dandy Ltd. and Stimorol Distribution Switzerland (both companies previously belonged to the Bagger-Sorensen Group but were sold to Cadbury-Schweppes Plc. in 2002).

Apart from a number of board positions in the Vecata portfolio, Steen Bagger-Sorensen is also a member of the board in Bagger-Sorensen & Co. Ltd, The Bagger-Sorensen Fund, Vecata Ltd. and the Danish football club VB Plus Ltd.

In 2000 Steen graduated in Business Administration from Aarhus School of Business (Aarhus University).
